description: Text-to-image editing involves modifying images based on textual descriptions or commands. This allows users to make changes to images without needing advanced graphic design skills.
you_have_this_if: You want to allow users to edit images using text prompts.
You need a solution that is accessible to non-professionals.
You require quick edits without heavy computational demands.
You are integrating image editing features into an application.
You are looking for a user-friendly interface for image modifications.

approaches.best_for: when you need to enable non-professionals to edit images easily and quickly.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While it is user-friendly and efficient, it may not offer the depth of features found in more complex editing tools.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a quick and simple solution for text-based image editing that can be used by non-experts.

start_here: Start with LightEdit for most cases, as it provides a balance of speed and ease of use, making it ideal for non-professionals.
